import React,{useState}from'react';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import{Container,Form,Button,ListGroup}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[task,setTask]=useState('');const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[filter,setFilter]=useState('All');const handleAddTask=event=>{if(event)event.preventDefault();// Prevent form submission from refreshing the page
if(task.trim()!==''){setTasks([...tasks,{task:task,completed:false}]);setTask('');}};const handleCompleteTask=index=>{const updatedTasks=[...tasks];updatedTasks[index].completed=!updatedTasks[index].completed;setTasks(updatedTasks);};const handleRemoveTask=index=>{const newTasks=tasks.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setTasks(newTasks);};const filteredTasks=tasks.filter(taskObj=>{if(filter==='All')return true;if(filter==='Completed')return taskObj.completed;if(filter==='Pending')return!taskObj.completed;return true;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center",children:"CheckMate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>setFilter('All'),children:"All"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>setFilter('Completed'),children:"Completed"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>setFilter('Pending'),children:"Pending"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:handleAddTask,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"Add a task",value:task,onChange:e=>setTask(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:handleAddTask,className:"mt-2 w-100",children:"Add Task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Tasks:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{children:filteredTasks.map((taskObj,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup.Item,{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Check,{type:"checkbox",checked:taskObj.completed,onChange:()=>handleCompleteTask(index),label:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{textDecoration:taskObj.completed?'line-through':'none'},children:taskObj.task})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"danger",onClick:()=>handleRemoveTask(index),children:"Remove"})]},index))})]});}export default App;
